card.name: Glory's Return
card.text: Untap target creature. That creature gets +0/+2 until end of turn. Create a tapped Powerstone token. (It’s an artifact with “{T}: Add {C}. This mana can’t be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.”)

card.name: Braeil Protector
card.text: 3C: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate this ability only if you control an artifact.

card.name: Repel Munitions
card.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. If that creature has a counter on it, draw a card.

card.name: Rigger Prodigy
card.text: When Rigger Prodigy enters the battlefield, create a tapped Powerstone token. (It’s an artifact with “{T}: Add {C}. This mana can’t be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.”) Whenever one or more artifacts you control leave the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Prodigal Sniper
card.text: 1C, {T}: Tap target creature unless its controller sacrifices an artifact.

card.name: Brave the Night
card.text: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains protection from all colors until end of turn. (It can’t be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything that’s white, blue, black, red, or green until end of turn.)

card.name: Alzhir Merchant
card.text: Tap three untapped creatures you control: Create a tapped Powerstone token. (It’s an artifact with “{T}: Add {C}. This mana can’t be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.”)

card.name: Headshot
card.text: Exile target attacking creature.

card.name: Ancestral Inventor
card.text: Whenever you draw one or more cards, if any of them aren’t the first card you drew this turn, create a tapped Powerstone token. (It’s an artifact with “{T}: Add {C}. This mana can’t be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.”)

card.name: Factory Analyst
card.text: Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)

card.name: Fluxfire Initiate
card.text: Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, Fluxfire Initiate gains hexproof until end of turn and can’t be blocked this turn.

card.name: Encounter the Infinite
card.text: Draw two cards then discard a card. Encode (Then if you cast this spell from your hand, exile it encoded on a creature you control. The next time that creature deals combat damage to noncreature permanent or player, you may cast this spell from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Fortune's Hand
card.text: Draw a card. Surveil 1 (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.) Encode (Then if you cast this spell from your hand, exile it encoded on a creature you control. The next time that creature deals combat damage to noncreature permanent or player, you may cast this spell from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Sudden Warp
card.text: Target creature gains flying and hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Divertive Strides
card.text: Untap target nonland permanent without a spell encoded on it. Encode (Then if you cast this spell from your hand, exile it encoded on a creature you control. The next time that creature deals combat damage to noncreature permanent or player, you may cast this spell from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Rigger's Resolve
card.text: Return any number of target creatures with different controllers each to their owners’ hands. The next time that creature deals combat damage to noncreature permanent or player, you may cast this spell from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Machine's Resonance

card.name: Twist Space
card.text: Choose one — • You may reselect which battle, planeswalker, or player target attacking creature is attacking. • Remove target attacking creature from combat. Draw a card.

card.name: Disappearance
card.text: Exile target creature. Put X plus one time counters on that card. At the beginning of the upkeep of that card’s owner, that player removes a time counter from that card. When the last is removed, return that card to the battlefield tapped under its owner’s control.

card.text: Exile target creature. Then return that creature to the battlefield. Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)

card.name: Dark Discovery

card.name: Space Oddity

card.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player

card.name: Cyber Reflex
card.text: Cyber Reflex deals 2 damage to target attacking creature. Cyber Reflex deals 5 damage to that creature instead if you control an artifact.

card.name: Sojourn to Vaxx
card.text: Draw two cards, then discard a card. Put a bounty counter on up to one target creature.

card.name: Otherworld Instincts
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Another target creature blocks this turn if able. Destroy those creatures at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Clockwork Madness
card.text: Discard your hand. Then draw three cards. Clockwork Madness deals damage equal to the combined mana value of cards discarded this way divided among any number of target creatures and/or planeswalkers.

card.text: Whenever a spell you cast becomes encoded on a creature you control, untap that creature. Creatures you control have “{T}: For each spell encoded on this creature, you may cast a copy of that spell without paying its mana costs.”

card.name: Cleave
card.text: Target creature you control fights target creature you don’t control. Then the creature you control fights up to one other target creature you don’t control.

card.name: Relentless Marine
card.text: Relentless Marine enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Horror. Relentless Marine has deathtouch as long as you control one or more Powerstone tokens.

card.name: Sudden Propulsion
card.text: Target creature you control gains haste until end of turn. You may have that creature assign its combat damage as though it weren’t blocked this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Plaxium Boilweird
card.text: Flying Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere except your hand, you may pay 2R. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Evolved State
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if it has greater power than enchanted creature, put a number of +1/+1 counters on enchanted creature equal to the difference between those creatures’ powers.

card.name: Derive from Steel
card.text: Create a tapped Powerstone token. (It’s an artifact with “{T}: Add {C}. This mana can’t be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.”) Draw X plus one cards then discard X cards, where X is equal to the number of Powerstone permanents you control.

card.name: Arlinn, Trespasser
card.text: [+1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. [0]: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn. [-8]: You get an emblem with “At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, this emblem deals 5 damage to any target.”

card.name: Easy Contract
card.text: Easy Contract deals 4 damage divided among any number of targets. Easy Contract deals twice as much damage to creatures with one or more bounty counters.

card.name: Turah Shredder
card.text: You may have Turah Shredder assign its combat damage as though it weren’t blocked. 2C: Put a +1/+1 counter on Turah Shredder.

card.name: Undying Troll
card.text: When Undying Troll dies, search your library for a basic land named Wastes. Put that card onto the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Nahiri, the Lost
card.text: [+2]: Target permanent gains indestructible until the beginning of your next turn. [0]: Creatures can’t attack planeswalkers you control until the beginning of your next turn.
